name: Contract Marriage
storyline:
A very ordinary protagonist who works in a bookstore decides to get married by contract to a beautiful boss he met by chance on the day he was dumped by his boyfriend! The beginning must have been a contract marriage...

You can choose the clothes and hairstyles of the characters according to the situation! It's a story game where you can enjoy the other party's reaction depending on your choice!
summary:
In this interactive story choice game, you are the one in control of the romantic story!
You have multiple options on how the story will unfold.
Immerse yourself in an enchanted game of your choice.
